attributes.action: Close schools 2 weeks before Christmas to ensure no teacher and child isolates
attributes.additional_details: By closing the schools earlier, it guarantees a 2 week isolation period for all children and staff to ensure they are clear for Christmas celebrations for families. Some bubbles will have to isolate and the effect on people’s well being knowing, after the difficult year we have had, they won’t be able to mix with anyone over Christmas is heart breaking. Schools could work remotely in this period so children will not be missing out learning
attributes.background: Schools are open right up until Christmas however, if a bubble has to isolate in the last week of term, this will result in the child and teacher not being able to spend Christmas with their family when government are allowing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

MPs will debate the impact of Covid-19 on schools and exams, including the request of this debate, on Monday 7 December.

You'll be able to watch the debate live on Parliament TV at 6pm: https://parliamentlive.tv/Commons
